name: Women & Gender Studies
descriptions: TCU’s Department of Women and Gender Studies puts women, gender, and sexuality at the center of academic investigation. Our programs promote inquiry into the intersections of gender with other identity categories; the workings of power in society; and the means of advancing social justice and equality.
The skills and knowledge gained through this degree are valuable in any profession that values diversity, equity, and inclusion.
